meanings.definition: The point that is the center of mass of a geometric figure.
meanings.sent1: The centroid of the shape shows where the weight is balanced.
meanings.sent2: In math class, we learned how to find the centroid of different shapes.
meanings.sent3: The centroid of the triangle decided to go on a diet to maintain its balance.
meanings.sent4: The centroid of the figure stood still, holding everything together like a glue.
meanings.sent5: Finding the centroid is like finding the heart of a shape.

meanings.definition: The point within a triangle where the medians intersect.
meanings.sent1: The centroid of the triangle is where all the lines meet.
meanings.sent2: The centroid of a triangle is not always at the center.
meanings.sent3: The centroid of the triangle threw a party at the intersection point.
meanings.sent4: The centroid of the triangle is like the meeting point of all roads.
meanings.sent5: The centroid of the triangle is like the boss of the lines, calling the shots.

meanings.definition: The point within a parallelogram where the diagonals intersect.
meanings.sent1: The centroid of the parallelogram is where the lines cross.
meanings.sent2: We calculated the centroid of the parallelogram in geometry class.
meanings.sent3: The centroid of the parallelogram decided to play hopscotch on the diagonals.
meanings.sent4: The centroid of the parallelogram is like the meeting point of two highways.
meanings.sent5: The centroid of the parallelogram is like the crossroads of the shape.
